description: This file defines a Python class 'SentenceTransformerEmbedder' that extends an 'Embedder' base class, providing methods to generate embeddings using the SentenceTransformer model. It includes external dependencies on 'sentence_transformers' and 'numpy', and handles import errors. The class encapsulates configuration parameters and methods for obtaining embeddings from text input.

classes.name: SentenceTransformerEmbedder
classes.description: A class that provides embedding functionalities using the SentenceTransformer model, extending the 'Embedder' base class.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates an embedding vector for the given text input, returning a list of floats.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Returns the embedding vector along with usage information (currently always None).
